channel.description:
Okay...I just downloaded a 508, and when I try to run it I get: "System could not find the path specified."
Now...I have jdk6.12 and jre6.12 and I changed it to that in the command prompts...But it still will not work, any help?

item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

“and I changed it to that in the command prompts…”

As in…I already did that.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Gflo Gflo
item.description:
@Gflo wrote:

Open the .bat or .cmd files and edit them to your jdk path

So right click on the file>select edit>

@echo off
cd ../src
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/players/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/players/update/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/players/items/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/players/combat/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/io/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/io/packets/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/net/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/util/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./bulby/rs2/world/items/*.java
pause

it should say somthing like that(that is the All .cmd)

edit thejdk1.6.0_12 edit it to your version of JDK

Read full topic
